bwwExcerpt: But if Between Riverside and Crazy does start to leak steam after its inspired first act, the same cannot be said of the strong cast, especially with Stephen McKinley Henderson giving such a supercharged performance in the lead role. The play could not be in better hands.
showScoreExcerpt:
"So far, so good. The entire first act is not only character-driven, it's well-plotted, clearly delineated, and anchored in reality."
